metadata.title: CVE-2019-13107 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Multiple integer overflows exist in MATIO before 1.5.16, related to mat.c, mat4.c, mat5.c, mat73.c, and matvar_struct.c

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-13107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio11 - 1.5.17-3
matio-tools - 1.5.17-3
No subscription required

notes.note: ebarretto> xenial and bionic versions differ from 1.5.16 making the backport tricky

criterions.comment: libmatio package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.17-3').
